thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com
thread.title: Donny Hammonds

author: Donny Hammonds
title: Donny Hammonds
text: I love working with WTS for all my cd duplication needs. They are quick at getting the orders done! The customer service is very friendly and they do what it takes to please their customers. I have been ordering my CDs from WTS for about 6 years and they have never let me down. The prices CANNOT be beat, I have went through the Internet and nothing comes close to their price & quality of work. My personal Rep Christy Bowen is a pleasure to work with. I do recommend this Company to all of my Recording Studio clients. WTS media is the only company that I'll use for my Cd Duplication. Give them a try and you'll be glad you did!
